synopsis.native: Frankie, célèbre actrice française, apprend qu’il ne lui reste plus que quelques mois à vivre. Elle décide de passer ses dernières vacances en famille à Sintra, au Portugal.
synopsis.english: Unfolding over the course of a late summer’s day in the fabled resort town of Sintra, Portugal, Frankie follows three generations who have gathered for a vacation organized by the family matriarch (Isabelle Huppert). In this fairy tale setting, husbands and wives, parents and children, friends and lovers -- stirred by their romantic impulses — discover the cracks between them, as well as unexpected depth of feeling.
